Something About Life Sleep daily calorie progress bar Sleep Tracker Food Tracker Search for Food Exercise Tracker Food Meal Planner Date Time Calories Food Cancel OK Help Search Home Delete?
Sleeping Awake Input Sleep Time Set New Sleep Please enter only a number You can track you sleep toggeling the awake/sleeping button, If you missed a sleep session you can add it later by clicking on the set sleep button. Clicking on any of the items in the list will bring up more details and let you delete that item as well. Sleep Tracker by Joel Schmuland Day of the week
Add Food Loading Food History… Getting food results… Food added successfully! Please enter food name Please enter a date/time Please enter calories Confirm your choice FoodTracker by James Thibaudeau FoodPicker by James Thibaudeau Click on food to search for a food to add, once added choose a date and time. Click Add Food to add a food to your list. Click on food items in the list to see details about the food Type in food to search, click on one to add. Description Details
Choose your Exercise on the List bellow 0000 Time (in minutes) Spent doing an Exercise Save on the Database Minutes "cal/min: " Click Here Total time in Exercise Minutes You Burned You canceled the Action Exercise added to the Database Exercise ID Exercise Name Exercise Date Exercise Duration Do you want to save the data on the Database? Saving on the Database Past Exercises Exercise Information: Image Description
Exercise Tracker by Carlos Barroso First set how many minutes you spent doing exercises today. Then, choose the exercise you were doing and click on the list
On this activity you can view how many calories you did burn today. If you want to save it on the DataBase, click on the button [Save on the database]. If yo want to view you records, click on your ListView and you will have the possibility to delete the item.

Meal Submit Button Meal Planner By Kathleen McNulty Meal By Kathleen McNulty First name your meal plan, then click your meal plan. Name your meal (breakfast, snack, lunch or dinner) then double click the meal name. "Enter Name of Meal Plan" \"Make your Meal Plan\"
